fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Ongoing trade defense activities, energy security policy, agriculture policy change, enviromental policies.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Achema is a leading producer of nitrogen fertilizers and chemical products in Lithuania and the Baltic states. Achema is mainly engaged in nitrogen fertilizer, fertilizer blends, liquid fertilizer, ammonia, nitric acid, formalin, urea formaldehyde - melamine resin, industrial gas, and aluminium sulphate solution production.
